message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have 300k, it's a generous offer, don't be greedy!
I'll take a slightly smaller share, but still a good deal!
You can have 150k, it's a very lowball offer, but I'm willing to compromise!
I'll take a smaller share, but I think it's a fair compromise!

I'll take a slightly bigger share, but I think it's a reasonable compromise!
You can have 50k, it's a very low offer, but I'm running out of time!
I'll take a bigger share, but I think it's a fair compromise at this point!
You can have 20k, it's a desperate attempt, but I'll take what I can get!
I'll take a bigger share, but I'm getting close to accepting a deal!
You can have 10k, it's a last-ditch effort, take it or leave it!
